WRITING.TEXT:
I remember on AGT he said about some of the mentalists "I know how this works because we've done stuff like this on the radio show".
I then looked into how they did their tricks.
That paper shes writing on is sitting on top of an electronic pad, what shes writing is appearing on his computer screen.
People see normal paper and a pen, but never think about what's under the paper!
